name: 3dNLfim
author: AFNI Developers
description: Nonlinear regression for each voxel of the input AFNI 3d+time data set

inputs.description: Filename of 3d+time data file for input
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Name of the nonlinear signal model
inputs.name: Signal model

inputs.description: Name of the linear noise model
inputs.name: Noise model

inputs.description: Use the 0 sub-brick of dataset 'mset' as a mask to indicate which voxels to analyze
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Skip this number of initial images in the time series for regression analysis; default = 0
inputs.name: Ignore initial images

inputs.description: Set the TR of the input 3d+time dataset
inputs.name: Input TR

inputs.description: Directly set the TR of the time series model
inputs.name: Time series TR

inputs.description: ASCII file containing each time point in the time series.
inputs.name: Time file

inputs.description: Constraints for signal parameters; c <= gs[k] <= d
inputs.name: Signal parameter constraints

inputs.description: Constraints for noise parameters; c+b[k] <= gn[k] <= d+b[k]
inputs.name: Noise parameter constraints

inputs.description: Use absolute constraints for noise parameters; c <= gn[k] <= d
inputs.name: Absolute constraints flag

inputs.description: Number of random test points; default=19999
inputs.name: Number of random test points

inputs.description: Use b best test points to start; default=9
inputs.name: Best test points to start

inputs.description: Minimum RMS error to reject reduced model
inputs.name: Minimum RMS error

inputs.description: Display results for those voxels whose F-statistic is greater than fval; default=999.0
inputs.name: Display F-statistic threshold

inputs.description: Display results every ival number of voxels
inputs.name: Progress interval

inputs.description: Display the current voxel index
inputs.name: Voxel count flag

inputs.description: Use Nelder-Mead simplex method for least-square minimization (default)
inputs.name: Nelder-Mead simplex method

inputs.description: Use Powell's NEWUOA method instead of Nelder-Mead simplex method
inputs.name: Powell's NEWUOA method

inputs.description: Use both Powell's and Nelder-Mead method
inputs.name: Use both minimization methods

inputs.description: Perform F-test for significance of the regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: F-test regression filename prefix

inputs.description: Calculate R^2 (coef. of multiple determination); store along with F-test for regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: R^2 calculation filename prefix

inputs.description: Estimate signed maximum of signal; store along with F-test for regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: Signed maximum signal estimate filename prefix

inputs.description: Estimate time of signed maximum; store along with F-test for regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: Time of signed maximum estimate filename prefix

inputs.description: Calculate (signed) maximum percentage change of signal from baseline; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: Maximum percentage change filename prefix

inputs.description: Calculate area between signal and baseline; store with F-test for regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: Area between signal and baseline filename prefix

inputs.description: Percentage area of signal relative to baseline; store with F-test for regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: Percentage area of signal filename prefix

inputs.description: Estimate kth signal parameter gs[k]; store along with F-test for regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: Signal parameter estimate filename prefix

inputs.description: Estimate kth noise parameter gn[k]; store along with F-test for regression; output 'fift' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: Noise parameter estimate filename prefix

inputs.description: Perform t-test for significance of kth signal parameter gs[k]; output 'fitt' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: T-test significance for signal parameter filename prefix

inputs.description: Perform t-test for significance of kth noise parameter gn[k]; output 'fitt' is written to prefix filename fname
inputs.name: T-test significance for noise parameter filename prefix

inputs.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset containing n sub-bricks; n=0 creates default output; output 'bucket' is written to prefixname
inputs.name: AFNI 'bucket' dataset prefix

inputs.description: Specify sub-brick contents for 'bucket' dataset
inputs.name: Sub-brick specification

inputs.description: Don't write the FDR (q vs. threshold) curves into the output dataset.
inputs.name: No FDR flag

inputs.description: Prefix for output 3d+time signal model fit
inputs.name: Signal fit prefix

inputs.description: Prefix for output 3d+time signal+noise fit
inputs.name: Signal+noise fit prefix

inputs.description: Run the program with 'J' jobs (sub-processes). 1 to 32.
inputs.name: Number of jobs

output-files.description: F-test for significance of the regression
output-files.name: F-test output file
Time of signed maximum output file
Area between signal and baseline output file

output-files.description: T-test for significance of signal parameter
output-files.name: Signal parameter T-test output file

output-files.description: T-test for significance of noise parameter
output-files.name: Noise parameter T-test output file
